patchNotes.entry: Added Refined Storage Addons. introduces the Wireless Crafting Grid, extending Refined Storage with crafting functionality for wireless grids.
Added Reborn Storage. a Refined Storage add-on featuring multi-block pattern crafters (up to 16x16) and larger item/fluid storage disks, improving crafting performance and storage scalability.
Added PolyLi. a lightweight library providing helper classes for GUI creation and other development tools to enhance mod efficiency and user experience.
Added Architectury API. a developer-focused framework that simplifies cross-modloader mod creation, offering a full build system and optional abstraction layers to streamline development.
